name: Invest Domains
overview:
This is a company that provides training and education about internet investing and marketing.

The programs are packed with information on the domain name industry. Listed below is what every package includes and also provides a brief overview of what you can expect to learn.

Introduction to Domains

This course is a complete overview of the entire domain name industry. You are introduced to domain valuations, domain parking, domain buying and selling, and resources to help you become a successful domain name investor.

Domain Investing Overview

This course provides a very in-depth overview of the entire domain name industry. Learn how people become successful in one of the fast growing industries of today s time.

Investing Tips

Learn what makes a domain name worth purchasing. This course teaches you how to find the domain names that can make you money, or appreciate over time.

Buying & Selling

This course teaches you how to effectively buy and sell domain names on the internet. The great thing is you can buy and sell to and from people all over the entire world. You literally have millions and millions of potential customers.

Drop Catching

Learn how to grab a domain name after someone lets it expire. This is a great way to build a portfolio of domain names that were previously unavailable. The Invest Domains course will teach you how to effectively find and purchase these domain names through drop catching services.

Domain Parking

This course teaches you how to generate a monthly income by parking your domain names with a parking service. This allows advertisers to advertise on your domain and in turn you get paid. This is a great way to build up a monthly income from your domain portfolio.

Guide to Successful Domain Name Investing

Learn how to grab a domain name after someone lets it expire. This is a great way to build a portfolio of domain names that were previously unavailable. The Invest Domains course will teach you how to effectively find and purchase these domain names through drop catching services.
